name: Piggy's Bank
description:
Piggy not included - yet.

Explore the Procedurally made(and populated) Maze, Gather Relics, Gear, and Skills along the way in Piggy's Bank.

Boss Type enemies(like Celestial Slimes and Lesser Liches) summon monster to the surrounding rooms, and non-boss monsters travel through the maze.

this mechanic is what populates the maze.
be warned - it happen when you make certain actions.

Fountains give permeant increase to certain stats, and Orbs protect the room from invading monsters letting you rest in peace(instead of pieces).

in future updates, the game will include NPCs you will be able to talk to and get help from.

Controls:

Most of the game is point and click except for the following.

K - opens the skill menu(close with K or Esc)

I/Tab - opens Inventory(close with I, Tab ,or Esc), used to equip items you picked up.

E - interact with an object you are colliding with(opening chests, unsealing hoards, drinking from a fountain and so on)

WASD - move around

+/- - change the volume of the music.
